verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O gracious God, Thy pleasure Is in Thy Christ made known, And tells the boundless measure Of blessing for Thine own. He has Thy presence entered, As Man in heav’n is known; In Him Thy glory’s centered, In Him Thy purpose shown.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And O what love is beaming Refulgent in that face! What blessed light is streaming From that most glorious place! Both love and light proclaiming What Thou, the Father, art, And wondrous grace revealing, With Thine own Son, our part.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou source of every blessing! Thou spring of all delight! Thy Name with joy confessing Let all the saints unite! Each heart its praise outpouring To Thee all praise above, Each voice in strains adoring Re-echoes—“God is love.”{/lang-eng}
